publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3747 Mike Pringle: HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission—That the Parliament is concerned about loss of competition in the large book retailer market; congratulates the Office of Fair Trading (OFT) for referring the acquisition of Ottakar’s Bookstores by the HMV Group to the Competition Commission; agrees with the OFT that "UK book-buyers value the fruits of this competition, which this merger would eliminate", and calls on the Competition Commission to prevent the merger.
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) Mark Ballard*, Chris Ballance*, Margaret Smith*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) Pauline McNeill*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) Shiona Baird*
S2M-3747 HMV/Waterstone’s Acquisition of Ottakar’s plc Referred to the Competition Commission (lodged on 16 December 2005) Linda Fabiani*
